aboutMeText: Born in Joinville, Santa Catarina, Brazil and currently living in Dublin. I am a person passionate about technology, sport and music. I started studying software development in high school when with the regular education I attended a technical computer course. After high school I started at the university studying a technical course in Analysis and Systems Development. While I was at university I got my first job as a software developer at  NG Inform√°tica. After 5 years of work I decided to come to Dublin in Ireland to study the English language. Since then I am passionate about the European lifestyle and I am looking for my first job opportunity outside Brazil.
